CustomField.description: Used in the matching logic to auto populate leads to accounts
CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,12)," Corporation"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," Corporation","")), IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,9)," Holdings"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," Holdings","")), IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,9)," HOLDINGS"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," HOLDINGS","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company,", Inc."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company,", Inc.","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company,", INC."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company,", INC.","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company,", Inc"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company,", Inc","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company,", INC"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company,", INC","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," Inc."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," Inc.","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," INC."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," INC.","")), IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,4)," Inc"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," Inc","")), IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,4)," INC"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," INC","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company,", LP"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company,", LP","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company,", Lp"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company,", Lp","")), IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,3)," LP"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," LP","")), IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,3)," Lp"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," Lp","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company,", L.L.C."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company,", L.L.C.","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," L.L.C."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," L.L.C.","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," L.L.C"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," L.L.C","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company,", LLC."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company,", LLC.","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company,", LLC"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company,", LLC","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," LLC."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," LLC.","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," LLC"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," LLC","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," Co."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," Co.","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," CO."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," CO.","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," co."),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," co.","")), IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,3)," Co"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," Co","")), IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,3)," CO"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," CO","")), IF(CONTAINS(RIGHT(Company,3)," co"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," co","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," Ltd"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," Ltd","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," LTD"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," LTD","")), IF(CONTAINS(Company," ltd"),TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(Company," ltd","")),Company)))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Company for Match Logic
